0.title: Gamp
0.short: Discover new recipes, share your favorites
0.long: Gamp is a platform for exploring new recipes, for foods and drinks. As the Front-end head developer, I have played a pivotal role in both the design and coding processes. Not only I contributed coding the Front-end of the project, but also I created the visual identity by designing the logo and illustrations used in the app.
0.setting: Team of three juniors full-stack developers

1.title: TableRise
1.short: Online user-friendly platform for RPG enthusiasts
1.long: Table Rise is an online platform for playing tabletop RPGs based on Dungeons & Dragons. My duties here started in the UX development team, helping creating the mockups in the prototyping phase. Later, I transitioned to the Front-end team to code both the application itself and automated tests.
1.setting: Team of 12, including project manager, product owner, UX designers and developers.
